data.lyric:
[ti:Daisies]
[ar:Katy Perry]
[al:Daisies]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Daisies - Katy Perry (凯蒂·佩里)
[00:01.45]Lyrics by：Michael Pollack/Katheryn Hudson/Jonathan Bellion/Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Jordan K. Johnson/Stefan Johnson
[00:02.90]Composed by：Michael Pollack/Katheryn Hudson/Jonathan Bellion/Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Jordan K. Johnson/Stefan Johnson
[00:04.36]Told them your dreams
[00:05.51]And they all started laughing
[00:11.32]I guess you're out of your mind
[00:13.27]'Til it actually happens
[00:20.19]I'm the small town
[00:21.99]One in seven billion
[00:24.00]Why can't it be me
[00:26.61]They told me I was out there
[00:28.64]Tried to knock me down
[00:30.59]Took those sticks and stones
[00:32.08]Showed 'em I could build a house
[00:34.39]They tell me that I'm crazy
[00:36.25]But I'll never let 'em change me
[00:38.27]'Til they cover me in daisies daisies daisies
[00:42.33]They said I'm going nowhere
[00:44.49]Tried to count me out
[00:46.25]Took those sticks and stones
[00:47.84]Showed 'em I could build a house
[00:50.18]They tell me that I'm crazy
[00:52.07]But I'll never let 'em change me
[00:53.96]'Til they cover me in daisies daisies daisies
[00:59.31]When did we all stop believing in magic
[01:06.39]Why did we put all our hopes in a box in the attic
[01:15.27]I'm the long shot
[01:17.24]I'm the Hail Mary
[01:19.18]Why can't it be me
[01:21.76]They told me I was out there
[01:23.80]Tried to knock me down
[01:25.72]Took those sticks and stones
[01:27.03]Showed 'em I could build a house
[01:29.49]They tell me that I'm crazy
[01:31.36]But I'll never let 'em change me
[01:33.32]'Til they cover me in daisies daisies daisies
[01:37.39]They said I'm going nowhere
[01:39.49]Tried to count me out
[01:41.39]Took those sticks and stones
[01:42.76]Showed 'em I could build a house
[01:45.21]They tell me that I'm crazy
[01:47.15]But I'll never let 'em change me
[01:49.03]'Til they cover me in daisies daisies daisies
[02:01.09]Cover me in daisies
[02:10.33]I'm the small town
[02:12.19]One in seven billion
[02:14.18]Why can't it be me
[02:16.77]They told me I was out there
[02:18.83]Tried to knock me down
[02:20.75]Took those sticks and stones
[02:22.25]Showed 'em I could build a house
[02:24.56]They tell me that I'm crazy
[02:26.50]But I'll never let 'em change me
[02:28.45]'Til they cover me in daisies daisies daisies
[02:32.53]They said I'm going nowhere
[02:34.70]Tried to count me out
[02:36.56]Took those sticks and stones
[02:37.92]Showed 'em I could build a house
[02:40.30]They tell me that I'm crazy
[02:42.25]But I'll never let 'em change me
[02:44.11]'Til they cover me in daisies daisies daisies
data.trans:
[ti:Daisies]
[ar:Katy Perry]
[al:Daisies]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.45]//
[00:02.91]//
[00:04.36]对他人分享你的梦想
[00:05.51]他们纷纷哄笑奚落
[00:11.32]我猜你大概也觉得自己异想天开
[00:13.27]直到梦想成真
[00:20.19]我卓尔不群
[00:21.99]七十亿分之一
[00:24.00]怎么就不能是我
[00:26.61]他们肆无忌惮
[00:28.64]试图将我击垮
[00:30.59]对我展开枪林弹雨的抨击
[00:32.08]我要向世人证明我能独树一帜
[00:34.39]他们对我说我不可理喻
[00:36.25]但我永远不会被人左右
[00:38.27]直到我被雏菊淹没簇拥
[00:42.33]他们曾对我说别妄图出人头地
[00:44.49]想把我淘汰出局
[00:46.25]对我展开枪林弹雨的抨击
[00:47.84]我要向世人证明我能独树一帜
[00:50.18]他们对我说我不可理喻
[00:52.07]但我永远不会被人左右
[00:53.96]直到我被雏菊淹没簇拥
[00:59.31]从何时起人们不再相信奇迹
[01:06.39]为什么我们把希望束之高阁
[01:15.27]我就是要孤注一掷
[01:17.24]为我祝福
[01:19.18]怎么就不能是我
[01:21.76]他们肆无忌惮
[01:23.80]试图将我击垮
[01:25.72]对我展开枪林弹雨的抨击

[01:31.36]但我永远不会被人左右
[01:33.32]直到我被雏菊淹没簇拥

[01:45.21]他们对我说我不可理喻
[01:47.15]但我永远不会被人左右
[01:49.03]直到我被雏菊淹没簇拥
[02:01.09]我被雏菊淹没簇拥

[02:26.50]但我永远不会被人左右
[02:28.45]直到我被雏菊淹没簇拥
